content: this cowl works up so quickly you ll be done before you know it it s a perfect last minute gift or treat for yourself and a wonderful palate cleanser between larger projects the treble_crochet stitches give it a great drape with 3rd loop half_double_crochet and puff stitches add an irresistible texture pattern is one size fits all and requires 2 skeins of most lion brand hometown usa solids some colors have less yardage per skein and will require 3 skeins
